# image-captioning
This is an LSTM based model that generates a suitable caption for the provided images.

Dataset used for the training is [Flickr8k dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/jainamshah17/flicker8k-image-captioning) from kaggle that provides 8000 images with 5 suitable descriptions for each image.

You can find the link to the kaggle notebook [here](https://www.kaggle.com/rohitsingh0210/image-captioning-edi).

<img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/kagglesdsdata/datasets/838708/1431853/Flickr8k_Dataset/Flicker8k_Dataset/1000268201_693b08cb0e.jpg?X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=gcp-kaggle-com%40kaggle-161607.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20211101%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20211101T071741Z&X-Goog-Expires=259199&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=host&X-Goog-" alt=little girls image>
Descriptions

- A child in a pink dress is climbing up a set of stairs in an entry way .
- A girl going into a wooden building .
- A little girl climbing into a wooden playhouse .
- A little girl climbing the stairs to her playhouse .
- A little girl in a pink dress going into a wooden cabin .
